description: About the job Purpose/Mission  Your role as a Business Analyst at adidas is to support on the maintenance and enhancement of the country sales database. Leveraging multiple data sources from across the business  the focus of the role is to enhance the capabilities of the team to analyse diverse data and data sources using Big Data and data base analysis tools.  This role requires a high degree of curiosity and passion for data analysis and problem solving. The ability to work independently  to share insights effectively and to deliver under tight timelines.  Accountabilities Own all data in the designated area of the business Interpret data  analyse results and provide intelligent insights to the business  Identify areas of opportunity and improvement Curate and maintain a Dashboard/scorecard to assist with strategic decision-making and distribution up to management level Generate analysis on a regular basis to provide operational insights in Excel/PowerPoint format in a manner understood by relevant audiences Prepare daily  weekly and monthly reports with insights Actively improve existing Data Management processes and standards Professional Background/Experience Funcional: Excellent analytical and organizational skills  with the ability to work under pressure and to adhere to timelines effectively Proactive and autonomous  with a problem-solving orientation and the ability to think outside of the box Capable of effectively interacting with functional and technical teams  with a good level of influencing skills  and willing to share knowledge with team members Detail-oriented and efficient time manager in a dynamic and fast-paced working environment Minimum 4 years of relevant experience in a similar role Experience on Retail  Product management or merchandizing preferred Education Requirements Bachelor degree in Business Analytics  Statistics  Economics or any other related field High level of proficiency in MS Office  especially MS Excel and VBA (SQL  R) It Requirements Outlook: Intermediate Word: Advanced Excel: Advanced PowerPoint: Advanced Language Skills English: Advanced Local Language: Fluent At adidas we have a winning culture. But to win  physical power is not enough. Just like athletes our employees need mental strength in their game. We foster the athlete's mindset through a set of behaviors that we want to enable and develop in our people and that are at the core of our unique company culture - the 3Cs: CONFIDENCE  COLLABORATION and CREATIVITY. CONFIDENCE allows athletes to make quick decisions on the field  to reach higher. For us at adidas confidence means acknowledging that we don't have all the answers. But we are willing to take risks  we try new things. And if we fail  then this is part of our learning - it helps us improve. COLLABORATION . Every elite athlete relies on partners: coaches  teammates  and nutritionists. We  too  know that we are stronger together. Winning as one team takes open and candid dialogue  inclusiveness and trust in each other's abilities and talents. Being the best sports company in the world takes CREATIVITY . No great athlete succeeds by copying their predecessors' training plans and strategies. We have to be open to new ideas  explore  gain an edge and stand out. Only then can we succeed. adidas celebrates diversity  supports inclusiveness and encourages individual expression in our workplace. We do not tolerate the harassment or discrimination toward any of our applicants or employees. We are an Equal Opportunity Employer.  Job Title: Specialist  Business Analyst  Brand: adidas  Location: Ho Chi Minh City  TEAM: Data & Analytics  State: 65  Country/Region: VN  Contract Type: Full time  Number: 416809  Date: Feb 18  2022

location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
description: About the job This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more The Job: Our company is seeking a full time Business Analyst to join a fast paced and agile development team. This is a Junior to Senior level position and would be ideally suited to a person with some experience in performing business analysis role for web and mobile applications.  Description Of Tasks Identify and analyse any gaps in data and report on these areas using simplified language Identify  investigate and analyse business and stakeholder requirements Aligning the business needs to the project vision Engage with the business and some stakeholder management Facilitate workshops with business and project stakeholders Participate in the documentation  analysis and validation of business processes  systems  and solution requirements Documenting and mapping end-to-end processes Collaborating with the Agile/Scrum teams to continuously deliver software Consult with stakeholders and systems requirements when documentation is insufficient Determine test conditions/ test objectives Create comprehensive test cases relevant to test conditions Managing software defects through to resolution Raise and close defects when necessary Work closely with Team Leads and stakeholders to capture business requirements  articulate it into high level design spec and work closely with developers through to testing completion. Work as an effective team member  share knowledge and information with the team and assist others in meeting team priorities Strong attention to detail  analytical and conceptual thinker A flexible and respectful approach in liaising with colleagues An ability to relate to people at all levels "Trainable" with the ability to quickly learn different types of technologies Enthusiastic  "can do" attitude  Always striving to develop both personally and professionally  Your Skills and Experience: The ideal candidate will possess the following key Technical requirements: Must have at least 1- 3 years or above as a Business Analyst Strong knowledge of IT systems Well-rounded analytical skills and strong problem-solving abilities Ability to interact with a range of stakeholders and maintain good relationships Ability to multitask Demonstrated ability to maintain accurate electronic and manual records. Documenting business requirements. Good analytical skills and an inquisitive mind Strong communication skills in both verbal and written English to liaise with stakeholders Strong initiative  accountability and leadership qualities Additionally  the following "nice-to-have" skillsets and experience are a bonus and can command higher salary: ERP or Accounting software knowledge or experience Benefits Month 13th bonus (paid before Tet and depends on company performance. If staff signed labor contract less than 12 months then the bonus is calculated pro-rata) Laptops provided. Health insurance. English working environment  Australian clients  onsite opportunities in Australia. Bonus programs for staff based on performance and projects Depends on certain projects  staff will be fully sponsored to Australia for training and work experience. Budget for team buildings and social purposes End or mid-year break for the entire team with travel and fully funded Employee Referral Program Parking allocation for motorbike Working time: Monday Friday. Flexible working hours.

description: About the job Job title : Business Analyst - PMO Contract type : Location : City Sectors :  Salary : Competitive Start date : 2022-04-03 Duration : 12.0 MONTH Job Reference : V-41127 Contact name : Ashleigh Warylo Contact email : Job published : 7 days ago  Our Government client is currently seeking an a Business Analyst to assist the team in Canberra  ACT. The successful candidate will support the Senior Business Analyst in managing requirements across policy  business  data  user and ICT work streams  including gathering  documenting and analysing business requirements for the VDS program.  The role requires gathering and maintaining controls on requirements that will feed into solution development. The VDS program is complex  and the business analyst will need to engage and collaborate with various stakeholders.  Roles And Responsibilities Participating in workshops and meetings with internal (project teams) and external stakeholders (partners) to gather requirements and confirm deliverables. Collaborating with stakeholders to analyse  clarify  elaborate  and document requirements . Documenting and resolving requirements’ issues and distinguish solutions from business requirements. Producing documents  processing maps  user stories and other artifacts to effectively capture and present requirements. Essential Criteria Excellent stakeholder engagement skills and ability to listen and ask the ‘right’ questions Experience in requirements management processes  including using tools to collect  analyse  define  prioritise  agree  and trace requirements Detailed knowledge of the software development lifecycle and business systems implementation. Location and Contract Term  This role is based in Canberra  ACT with an estimated start date of 18 April for 12 months. 1x 12 month extension is also available.  Security Requirements  Applicants must be have the ability to obtain baseline clearance  How To Apply  Please upload your resume to apply. Please note you will be required to complete a selection criterion to complete this application process. We will be in touch with instructions for suitably skilled candidates.  Please call Joanne Finchett on 1300 944 936 for any further information. Applications close Friday 8 April 2022 at 5pm.

description: About the job This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more THE JOB We are actively looking for a Business Analyst to join the development team. You will have a chance to work with our proactive and talented people with a great teamwork  opening and respectful working environment. At our company  you will be working with our international clients  you will have the chance to advance and grow your career.  WHAT YOU’LL BE DOING Work on Cloud computing  Web and Mobile projects. You will be responsible for taking requirements  estimations  and clarifying the needs with the project to define user stories and test cases. Work closely with international clients to clarify high level specifications  estimate efforts  support business development team to prepare Work Breakdown Structure  Quotation  Scope of Work. Participate in developing prototype  mock-up/writeframe  and UI/UX design. Gather  analyze  and translate business requirements into documents such as project scope  project description  functional requirements  user stories. Verify team outputs by performing user acceptance testing  smock testing  etc. Create and maintain project documents including globassaries  lessons learned  user guides. REQUIREMENTS At least 3 years experience at BA position in the software project. Proficient communication in English. Have good documentation and presentation skills. Oral and written communication skills Interpersonal and consultative skills Analytical thinking and problem solving Stakeholder analysis Have knowledge about programming  athorithm  and data structure. Have knowledge of SQL and data modelling. Experienced in multi-tenant database modelling is a big plus (i.e. has experience in SaaS applications). Basic knowledge about Cloud computing such as Amazon Web Services  Microsoft Azure  or Google Cloud. Experience in Inventory Management  eCommence  Edutech  CRM/ERP is a plus. WORKING WITH US As a start-up company  our team is our highest priority and we welcome new talent in our team. Along with our young spirit  our aim is to create an ideal and open environment where each person is eager to work and encouraged by the creative ability of every member of our team. We put human development as the first priority. We give you challenging and interesting work. Freedom and flexibility in the working environment. Attractive salary and annual salary review (based on skills and experience). Activities: Yearly company trips  Year-end Party  Teambuilding  Football Clubs. Training activities: Management  Soft Skills  Technology. 13th payment  and extra bonus for excellent employees. Promotion opportunities for Senior and Leader level. Bonus on Public holiday. Salary review: twice / year Overtime is rarely required  you will get paid for the extra work. Career guidance and support. ABOUT US We just started in Aug 2018. Our mission is to create awesome products that will make your everyday life easier. Our experienced engineering and development team are committed  passionate  and continually challenge themselves on the advancements and changes of the technologies we utilize to deliver the most up-to-date and innovative solutions. At InnomizeTech  we believe that people are our company’s greatest asset as we continuously innovate to create a supportive environment that will accommodate our employee’s personal and professional development – an environment that is designed to foster growth that benefits both our people and our clients’ success.

About the job Cho Tot’s Property vertical (a.k.a Cho Tot Nha) is looking for a Business Analyst to join us on an ambitious journey ahead. Our mission is to make buying and selling  renting and leasing real estates much easier  by building an effective  reliable and engaging platform for Vietnamese people. This is a rare opportunity to work with a leading platform having millions of visitors every month  to be in the frontline of the rising PropTech industry  and to drive the success of such businesses. You will contribute & make an impact through Translate data into insights: Understand and analyze market  competition landscape and user behaviors which involve users interviews  researches and data deep-dive analysis. This also involves producing a lot of reports  dashboards  and presentations. Fail fast  learn fast: Plan for  carry out and analyze experiments and A/B testings to optimise users experience and improve users engagement. Accepting failure and continuously striving for better results are a must. Shape the future: Prepare proposals for new products and features from your collected insights  drive the development of your initiatives by working closely with other teams. There is absolutely no one-size-fit-all  but a success candidate might Have good critical thinking  be able to solve problems with logical yet innovative solutions. Self-motivated  always take full ownership of your work  and know how to organize your projects (because you may execute multiple projects at once). Have excellent interpersonal and communication skills. Able to thrive in a dynamic  fast-paced environment against tight deadlines. Have high competency in Excel and PowerPoint  be familiar with or willing to learn data tools: e.g. SQL  BigQuery  Data Studio  Google Analytics. Fluent in English and Vietnamese. What is waiting for you Get your seat belt fasten  because there are many challenges waiting ahead. But you will be in a fun and supportive team full of intelligent minds and collaborative spirit. Get exposed to and directly work with an extensive  large-scale database  because data has a first-class seat at Cho Tot. Full of learning and training opportunities to grow your professional and personal skills. If you love to squeeze the insights out with tons of questions  keep asking why and go extra miles to continuously strive to be the best  jump on the bandwagon with us   Thank you for taking your time to read our job description and thank you in advance if you decide to apply for this position. Shortlisted candidates will be contacted within 2 weeks since application  otherwise we might meet when another chance arises.

About the job Apply to this vacancy and get a sign on bonus of up to 115 million VND.  Currently  we are looking for a remote Senior Business Analyst to join our team.  The client is a British home improvement retailer and garden center  based in the UK and owned by another huge UK retailer  with more than 230 stores throughout the country. Its main business is the sale of supplies and materials  for homeowners and the building trade. The company also trades in the kitchen and bathroom market  in which it has extensive ranges from budget take away kitchens and bathrooms  to more bespoke professionally designed kitchens and bathrooms.  WHAT IS HYBRIS?  It's a leading eCommerce platform being authentically the future of eCommerce today. It incorporates stores for the web  mobile  and more for B2C and B2B including powerful search and merchandising  master data management (MDM) / PIM  order management  and web content management. Built on a single stack of modern  standards-based  service-oriented technology. Hybris can manage 20 million SKUs on one of the largest online retail sites  two million customers and 500 000 orders per day for one of the largest wholesale distributors  2 500 stores in 44 global markets for one of the largest physical retailers. In just 4 months  hybris was deployed in 42 countries and now processes 6000 inquiries per second.  WHY HYBRIS?  Hybris can: build upon latest Spring release  including Spring MVC and Spring Integration frameworks  provide full-text search with SOLR  provide RDBMS-independent  support MongoDB in certain modules  provide plain old JSP + top-edge JavaScript frameworks for a storefront  support both REST and SOAP  provide modular architecture  cloud integration and best code practices (Checkstyle  CPD  PMD  FindBugs).  Requirements 3+ years of relevant experience Experienced in E-Commerce domain is a big plus Produce business requirement artifacts including UML  Use Cases  Business Rules  Functional and Non-Functional Specifications  User Interface Design Specifications  etc. Good knowledge of Scrum methodology  understanding BA role in Scrum Possibility of partly SM role performing Strong analytical and problem-solving skills Excellent communication skills Advanced English level (direct customer interaction) Experience in customer relationship management and critical issue handling  manage client expectations Ability to implement the processes improvement and drive change  We offer Medical insurance with 100% of insurance cost covered for you and your legal dependents Paid time off Stable income 100% remote work forever Free licensed software Possibility to work on your own device (BYOD) Stable workload Relocation opportunities Flexible engagement models Free trainings for technical and soft skills Language courses Access to internal communities and competency centers Access to internal and external e-Libraries Certification opportunities Skill advisory service  This is a remote position and we welcome applications from anywhere in Viet Nam  We accept CVs only in English.  Please note that even though you are applying for this position  you may be offered other projects to join within EPAM Anywhere. Work closely with the technical lead/project manager to define work for the developers via acceptance criteria on the user stories Generate ideas for how our solutions can make our clients more successful Understand business processes and provide guidance relative to emerging trends and strategy  understand customer's business  pain points  needs and strategic plans Manages and maintains test plan and strategy to map the requirements traceability matrix and support business user acceptance/integration testing. Put together the best practices around requirement gathering and scope management working closely with the PM and Architect on the project. Experience Requirements Strong stakeholder management skills  excellent written/verbal communication skills in English and experience presenting information and updates to leadership. Experience in working on Commerce  Experience (ie  Website  Mobile app) projects for managing/writing Story/Backlogs as the project will be in AGILE manner  is a MUST. Solution Architecture experience is preferred. Strong analytical skills with the ability to collect  organize  analyze  and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracy Ability to work independently and navigate organizational complexities to obtain support/resources needed to move initiatives forward with minimal supervision. Ability and enthusiasm to work with multiple clients in diverse domains  and to be mobile in terms of workplace or location Knowledge of digital platforms  frameworks and technology landscape Self-confidence  adaptable and able to cope with changing and evolving priorities while being able to identify new opportunities Experience in website and application development and designing digital solutions Must understand complex digital projects and concepts as they relate to high-level business objectives  and ability to present those concepts to both IT and non-IT audiences in a concise and easily understandable manner. Experience with digital technologies and solutions (content management  eCommerce  CRM  marketing  and email automation) is strongly preferred. jobTitle: Senior Business Analyst - fully Remote job
location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
description: About the job An Australian cloud based mobile POS software for all food outlet & hospitality stores are on the lookout for a Business Analyst.  About The Business Analyst Role  This role would suit someone with experience as a business analyst  product analyst  or other detail-focused work preferably in the hospitality domain.  This role will report directly to a Product Manager  and you’ll provide input into how we sequence and break apart work because you have the vision of the bigger picture.  Key Responsibilities Translating business requirements into clear  concise  testable and accurate user stories & process flows Understanding various partner business landscapes and clearly articulating business needs from a varied group of integration partners Ensuring that requirements are understood through story kickoffs and constant communication using a variety of analysis and documentation techniques including the application of visualisation techniques to underpin joint understanding of processes and data Liaise between the client and your team consisting of SMEs  C-suite executives  developers  quality analysts  tech architects  user experience designers  project managers  etc. to manage product backlogs and keep an eye on software delivery Communicating any requirement dependencies  issues  or risks identified through the analysis process Contributing to Showcases  facilitating analysis workshops with senior stakeholders to outline the business vision objective  product roadmap  release plan  and participating in team stand-ups  retrospectives & iteration planning sessions Responsible for providing analytical support to the product roadmap and help in strategic planning. Participating in estimation sessions by describing the requirements and clarifying any questions raised Addressing any requirement questions or issues that arise during the delivery process To succeed in this role  you must have excellent communication skills.  Key Requirements Four years of professional experience as a Business Analyst in a product based company Well versed using Agile  Lean & Continuous Delivery methodologies You have a track record of delivering impactful software  ideally on a collaborative software delivery team You have attention to detail  a practical approach to the day-to-day work of story-writing and delivery and can draw a line directly from an overarching client/Product strategy to your team's outcomes You enjoy unearthing the root cause(s) of a Product/Clients pain points  validating a business opportunity or problem and partnering to deliver a solution Excellent written and verbal communication skills  including the ability to run workshops and to communicate effectively with Product Managers  Developers  Consultants  End Users and other stakeholders across the organisation You understand how businesses operate and have experience modelling business processes using a variety of tools and techniques to facilitate requirement elicitation sessions You have a genuine passion for quality software and know how to get from sketch to code You have a knack for prioritisation  obtaining buy-in from stakeholders  and resolving conflicts as they arise You're resilient and flexible in ambiguous situations and enjoy solving problems from technical and business perspectives This leading company has an outstanding international reputation in its field. This well-recognised brand offers a great working environment.  If you are driven  determined and want to take the next step in your career  this is the role for you. Great career progression opportunities await the right person in this exciting job.  Apply today.    Due to the high volume of applications we are experiencing  our team will only be in touch with you if your application is shortlisted.

About the job Responsibilities: - Evaluating business processes  anticipating requirements  uncovering areas for improvement  and developing and implementing solutions. - Leading ongoing reviews of business processes and developing optimization strategies. - Staying up-to-date on the latest process and IT advancements to automate and modernize systems. - Conducting meetings and presentations to share ideas and findings. - Performing requirements analysis. - Documenting and communicating the results of your efforts. - Effectively communicate your insights and plans to cross-functional team members and management. - Gathering critical information from meetings with various stakeholders and producing useful reports. - Working closely with clients  technicians  and managerial staff. - Providing leadership  training  coaching  and guidance to junior staff. - Allocating resources and maintaining cost efficiency. - Ensuring solutions meet business needs and requirements. - Performing user acceptance testing. - Managing projects  developing project plans  and monitoring performance. - Updating  implementing and maintaining procedures. - Prioritizing initiatives based on business needs and requirements. - Serving as a liaison between stakeholders and users. - Managing competing resources and priorities. - Monitoring deliverables and ensuring timely completion of projects. About the job The primary role of the Senior Consultant is to partner with the client in understanding their business requirements so that they may be translated into viable  clear and logical Business requirements specifications. These specifications will form the basis upon which most  if not all  systems development and testing work for a given project will be executed. Sr. Consultants are expected to be have very strong problem solving and analytical capabilities coupled with excellent stakeholder management and communication skills. Further  Sr. consultants are expected to supervise teams of Consultants/BA  under the direction of the Project Manager to ensure that the objectives of the Project are attained.  Key Responsibilities Including but not limited to:  Train and mentor Consultants/BAs as required  Lead discussions with business users to understand the current and future analytical needs (Functional and non-functional requirements)  Lead meetings/workshops with business users in determining business requirements  Identify  capture and translate any operational requirements into clear Functional Use Cases/business processes  Facilitate Client UAT as required  Liaise directly with business stakeholders to understand  analyse and help document data and process requirements.  Analyse data relationships and dependencies  business processes and communication for mapping into future system requirements  Recommend and propose new systems/functionality to help realise business objectives.  Have a detailed understanding of eBao’s application and perform Gap Analysis and provide solutions to address the gaps  Be an expert on eBao’s product configuration engine and analyse how to structure product specification into Product Configurations  Liaise with Development and Testing Teams to ensure that all documented specifications are clearly understood  Work closely with technical teams and business stakeholders to prepare clear business objectives and system specifications for the design  development and enhancement of applications.  Assist in the creation and implementation of business and system test plans.  Contribute to the integrity of new systems and the delivery of quality systems that meet business requirements.  Qualifications  Bachelor degree or above in insurance  mathematics and statistics or relative discipline  At least 7 years combined experience in either Information Technology  Consulting  Insurance Industry or Financial Services  At least 4 years combined experience as a Business Analyst covering business process analysis  specification writing and documentation  Sound knowledge and experience in General/Life insurance products  Experience in setting up General/Life Insurance products in any core Insurance package  Excellent written and verbal communication skills  Advanced skills in the use analytical and communication tools such as MS Excel  Word and PowerPoint  Strong analytical and problem solving skills  Quality orientation and attention to detail

description: About the job Established in 2015  Katalon  Inc. is a global product company providing “All-in-one” test automation solutions that empower teams to deliver software with excellence and confidence. Since launch  we have been experiencing exponential growth  continuously furnishing more than 100 000 enterprises worldwide  and were proudly named the “Best Test Automation of 2020” by Gartner Peer Insights.  As a Senior Business Analyst  you will perform links between the product team  engineering team  and others. Apart from dissecting and analyzing data  you regularly conduct deep dives to provide probable causes and pragmatic solutions before communicating them to the key stakeholders.  In this vital role  you must have the technical aptitude to understand the requirements and scope defined by the product team to ensure the developed software meets the desired outcomes.  Key Responsibilities: Analyze requirements that are uniquely traceable  verifiable  and prioritized in a manner that is acceptable to both business and technology stakeholders Evaluate the company products and compare them against industry trends. Develop an understanding of company products to meet the company's current and future needs. Use data and process modeling tools (including  but not limited to  process mapping  business  object  and dataflow modeling) to analyze and represent information in usable form to translate business requirements into meaningful statements of work. Support the delivery of features  including ongoing maintenance of features and stories/tasks  Communicate iteration priorities  feature sets  roadmaps  and customer feedback to a variety of different stakeholders and executives Assist the company in achieving short and long-term goals relating to product growth. Work with other company departments to improve the analysis and presentation of products.  Requirements  Key Qualifications At least 5 years of experience in product development with at least 3 years as an IT / Technical Business Analyst or Product Owner Possess solid Agile and Scrum practices Excellent English writing  oral  and interpersonal communication skills. Extensive experience at a fast-growing tech company. Adaptability and a willingness to learn new skills  technologies  and framework Healthy skills in using suitable tools for business modeling  drawing business and technical flows/diagrams  creating mockups /wireframes/prototypes  etc.  Nice to have Bachelor's Degree  preferably in IT/Engineer  Business Information System  Computer Science  or related areas Any additional certification or training in BA  PO  UX  or related area (e.g. PSPO  CSPO  CBAP) (preferred) Experience in Automation Testing is a BIG PLUS.  Benefits  At Katalon  we bring together self-starting  open-minded  and talented people while actively promoting a transparent and growth-enabling working environment.  World-class products  Lifelong comrades  Experts in various fields  Exceptional teams  & Happy workplace are 5 things we are proud to constantly check off the list for the best place to work. But don’t just take our words for it. Take a better look below  Attractive compensation package including achievable Quarterly Performance Bonus (3 - 5 salary months per year) and 13th-Month Salary 19 Annual leave days and other supportive allowances Flexible working time and place together with high-end working equipment A-class office amenities provided  including modern workspace design  in-house entertainment facilities  and unlimited refreshments & snacks Premium healthcare package for you and your loved ones A company trip every summer  annual year-end party  team building activities  and so much more fun are waiting for you   Katalon is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We care about our people and celebrate our differences. We want to work with talented  collaborative  and innovative people. We do not discriminate in hiring or any employment decision based on race  color  religion  national origin  age  sex (including pregnancy  childbirth  or related medical conditions)  marital status  ancestry  physical or mental disability  genetic information  veteran status  gender identity or expression  sexual orientation  or other characteristics protected by law.

About the job Job Description As a Business Analyst in Cryptopie Labo  your primary objective is to perform research  requirement analysis  document processes  build business cases and convey technical concepts to non-technical users in a concise way. You will be responsible to be up to date with the latest trends and technologies. As a Business Analyst you will be involved in development projects as well as finance  marketing  account and operations. Constant innovation is the key to success and as the business analyst you will be tasked to help the company achieve this very important goal in an efficient and effective way. Create a monthly market trends report on crypto and related sectors such as FX  Gaming and Fintech. Produce reports for the Product Management and Business Development teams. Communicate with various industry partners and exchanges and assist preparing necessary due diligence documentations Support the efforts of the Product Management and C level team Research competitions or trends in the industry and create a comprehensive comparison reports Gathering critical information from meetings with various stakeholders and producing useful reports. Track and report the efficiency of each team in the company Compiles budgetary and fiscal data received from all departments to prepare and update monthly budgets Analyzes records of present and past operations  trends and costs Join and be active on various SNS an online communities related to blockchain technologies and the crypto space Gain a deep understanding of various relevant aspects of the crypto and forex industry including technology  legal  regulatory  economic  and protocol background details.  Requirements: At least four years in a role related to blockchain technology  crypto  finance or fintech Experience researching crypto assets and markets Familiarity with crypto markets and principles Strong writing and presentation skills in both Japanese (equivalent to N2) and Vietnamese An eagerness to continue learning at a fast pace. Ability to work under pressure and to meet deadlines. A passion for the potential of blockchain technology. Ability to not just analyze but communicate and present in a comprehensive manner. Impeccable attention to detail and ability to produce high-quality reports on a short deadline.  Benefits and Incomes Attractive  competitive salary upto $2000. Working devices including Macbook Pro M1 (new)  monitor  mechanical keyboard... Flexible working time (core time from 9:00 to 16:00). Be trained  sponsored to participate in courses to develop into a Key member  Manager. Bonus twice/year  equal to 14-15 months of salary. Full salary in probation period  with leave days. Enjoy Social Insurance  Health Insurance  Unemployment Insurance  maternity allowance for female employees according to the regulations issued by the State. Annual company trip and participate in regular team building activities. Contact the job poster Ha Mi Nguyen 2nd Looking for C#  NodeJS  Android  QA/QC  Devops in Blockchain technology in Hanoi Job Poster Location Hanoi  Hanoi  Vietnam Send InMail

jobTitle: Senior Business Analyst - Sales Excellence Leader (Manufacturing)
description: About the job About Avery Dennison RBIS Avery Dennison RBIS  a global leader in apparel and footwear industry solutions  is a $1.5 billion division of Avery Dennison (NYSE: AVY). Avery Dennison RBIS provides intelligent creative and sustainable solutions that elevate brands and accelerate performance throughout the global retail supply chain. We elevate brands through graphic tickets  tags and labels  embellishments and packaging solutions that enhance consumer appeal. We accelerate performance through RFID enabled inventory and loss prevention solutions  price management  global compliance  and brand security solutions. Based in Westborough  Massachusetts Avery Dennison RBIS responsibly serves the global marketplace with operations in 115 locations  50 countries  across 6 continents. For more information  visit www.rbis.averydennison.com.  Something you might want to know about us: Working location: Avery Dennison RBIS factory based in Nha Be area  Can Giuoc ~ 20km from Bitexco tower  D1 - the city center (30mins traveling by bus only) Daily Shuttle buses are provided from all districts in HCMC. Lunch is provided + Allowances for Breakfast Working time: Mon - Fri  8.00am-4.15pm We provide a professional  fun MNC working environment with a strong Leadership team  friendly colleagues  and here  your personal career grows with us  Three consecutive years The Best Place to work in Asia 2019 - 2020 - 2021 (HR Asia Award)  ABOUT YOUR ROLE Avery Dennison is seeking a results-oriented Sales Excellence Leader to join the Commercial Sales Team. Reporting to the Factory General Manager  this person will play a key role in furthering the strategic selling and analytic capabilities of our Commercial Sales Team. In this role  you will drive our Account Management process  including strategic and financial planning efforts  business intelligence  ad hoc reporting needs and review processes.  You will be a business process subject matter expert to support the development of processes  tools  and performance metrics as well as driving execution and adoption with the global teams. Acting as a change agent  you will be the process and subject matter expert responsible for driving continuous improvement and support for the Account Management process. The successful candidate will combine a solid understanding of world-class sales processes  tools and analytics to help our Commercial Sales Team drive value and revenue. This role requires passion  creativity and excellent communication skills that are balanced by exceptional business acumen and selling skills.  *YOUR RESPONSIBILITIES WILL INCLUDE: ● Lead the development and deployment of processes and strategies for the Global Commercial Sales Team within defined region. ● Lead discovery sessions to uncover process opportunities  needs  and pains to form requirements for the CRM and align with global teams. Ensure the CRM meets the business needs and processes. Drive adoption of CRM globally. ● Work directly with Sales Leadership to execute key sales enablement programs and provide value-added thought partnership. ● Define and manage key SOPs - including Market Planning  Customer Wiring and Analysis  Pipeline Management  Profitability  Forecasting  Change Management and Data Governance. ● Coordinate with our CRM team to deliver end-user training and drive adoption. ● Collaborate with other functions  including Innovation and Market Development  CPD/CPD  Supply Chain and Customer Service to ensure alignment for global execution across the organization. ● Develop Commercial Sales Org to translate data trends  market data and SWOT analyses into strategies and action plans to support customer-focused and internal objectives. ● Serve as an internal consultant  facilitator and educator on strategic thinking and understanding business analytics and metrics  in order to develop and lead the sales organization to become strategic thinkers and planners. ● Help infuse process discipline  systems thinking and critical tools deep into the Commercial Sales Org in order to support closure of new mandated business and nominations. ● Analyze and report on strategic sales initiatives  project status  account plans and ongoing overall progress using data visualization tools - i.e. QlikView. ● Collaborate with peers and other functional teams to develop and deliver sales training curriculum (both virtual and in-person) and measure the effect on the business. ● Build institutional knowledge by systematically capturing  documenting and disseminating lessons learned from prior projects and initiatives. ● Create and recommend sales process improvements to further develop the RBIS Global Account Management process. ● Discover and document sales organization development needs. ● Communicate complex concepts in a simple and straightforward manner.  WHAT WE WILL BE LOOKING FOR IN YOU: ● Bachelor's or Master's degree strongly preferred. ● 5-7 years related business experience  with emphasis on sales operations  global project management  analytics/reporting and financial planning. ● Experience utilizing CRM and driving user adoption highly preferred. ● Excellent overall business acumen and organizational savvy  including expert level presentation and meeting facilitation skills. ● Ability to build relationships across various levels of the organization (virtually & in-person). ● Prior experience building and executing sales training programs and curriculum. ● Ability to manage several projects simultaneously  delivering high quality work while under significant deadline pressure. ● Proficiency in making comprehensive and insightful presentations for senior leadership ● Experience with Data Visualization Tools such as QlikView/QlikSense highly preferred. ● Excellent project and process management skills - Lean Sigma background preferred. ● Extensive experience working in a team-oriented  collaborative environment. ● Ability to take direction from multiple sources and create a shared vision. ● Expert in Microsoft Office products  including Excel and PowerPoint and their Google Drive equivalents. ● Strong record of achievement  with solid analytical skills and an entrepreneurial hands-on approach to work. ● Previous sales  sales operations or sales management experience highly preferred. ● Excellent people skills  including experience working with a variety of inter-departmental and international stakeholders. • Ability to travel  as required for the role (Approx. 10%). Contact the job poster Minh Minh Tran 2nd Talent Acquisition & Employer Branding (TA & EB) at Avery Dennison Job Poster Location Ho Chi Minh City  Vietnam Send InMail

About the job Job Purpose The job holder is responsible for conducting research and analysis in order to create a detailed business analysis  outline problems  opportunities and solutions for a business. The job holder will identify all required data sources  internal and external to support targeted research  analysis and documentation. The job holder is expected to develop new business models to support sound  data-driven business decisions and solutions.  Key Accountabilities Research and Analysis - Gather market trends and internal data to conduct analysis based on business issues and needs as they relate to a potential change or transformation. - Develop informative and actionable reports that highlight business trends and opportunities for improvement. - Identify and report trends and patterns to provide forecast on business plans. - Use data modelling  budgeting and forecasting techniques to present analysis for business decisions. - Recommend solutions (services  processes or products that solve a particular problem)  consider pros and cons of each recommendation. - Identify costs and business savings.  Reporting and Documentation - Work closely with project teams / business tribes to understand and document business objectives and processes. - Suggest modifications and improvements for improved operating efficiencies. - Implement  test and deploy solutions to business problems. - Create functional specifications / documentation / user manuals for new systems and processes. - Explain technical jargon to non-technical / commercial teams. - Simplify requirements so they are easily understood across the whole team.  Requirements - Must have experience in Banking  Financial Services  FinTech  Insurance  Investment  Advisory or relevant industries - At least 3 years of experience in a similar role - Business English standard of proficiency is required - A Bachelor's degree or higher in Finance  Banking  Economics  Computing  Information Technology  Business Management or relevant disciplines - Certification from the Institute of Business Analysis (IIBA) is preferred - Intermediate to Advanced MS Excel skills - Proven analytical and modelling capability with gap analysis  SWOT analysis - Experience working across multiple project scopes and in an agile operating environment - Experience writing SQL queries and using data visualization techniques and tools

About John Hancock And Manulife  John Hancock is a unit of Manulife Financial Corporation  a leading international financial services group that helps people make their decisions easier and lives better. We operate primarily as John Hancock in the United States  and Manulife globally  including Canada  Asia and Europe. We provide financial advice  insurance and wealth and asset management solutions for individuals  groups and institutions. Assets under management and administration by Manulife and its subsidiaries were CAD$1.3 trillion (US$1.1 trillion) as of June 30  2021. Manulife Financial Corporation trades as MFC on the TSX  NYSE  and PSE  and under 945 on the SEHK. Manulife can be found at manulife.com .  One of the largest life insurers in the United States  John Hancock supports more than 10 million Americans with a broad range of financial products  including life insurance   annuities   investments   401(k) plans   and education savings plans . Additional information about John Hancock may be found at johnhancock.com .  Manulife is an Equal Opportunity Employer  At Manulife /John Hancock   we embrace our diversity. We strive to attract  develop and retain a workforce that is as diverse as the customers we serve and to foster an inclusive work environment that embraces the strength of cultures and individuals. About the job A. Background and principal duties:  The Technology Department of SPS Vietnam delivers and maintains software projects in the area of document processing. Our software is used by SPS Vietnam and SPS affiliates in Europe  the US  and Asia to process millions of documents per year from our end customers from various industries (finance  insurance  transportation  logistics  consumer  etc.).  As IT Business Analyst (BA)  you are part of the ITBA team and your main duty is to gather business requirements from SPS affiliates in Europe  the US  and Asia. Those requirements are first critically analyzed and improved to maximize business value. Then you work with developers  testers  and project managers to estimate effort  cost  and timeline. Once approved  you transfer the requirements to the developers.  B. Responsibilities: Looking from the process side  the main responsibilities are: • Gathering business requirements from SPS affiliates in Europe  the US  and Asia. • Understanding and critically analyzing the requirements with the goal to simplify them and modify them so existing solutions can be reused as much as possible. • Working with developers  testers  and project managers to estimate effort  cost  and timeline. Reviewing those estimates with our colleagues from Europe  the US  and Asia. • Once approved  handing over the requirements to developers and testers.  Good requirements are the foundation of the success of every project. Therefore  we expect you to: • Ensure scope/requirements are crystal clear (both when received from business and transferred to team)  fully aligned/agreed with all stakeholders  and kept fully controlled (documented  tracked  not forgetting scope or allowing scope creep). • Ensure scope/requirements are critically reviewed in order to increase business benefit while reducing complexity and effort to implement and maintain the software. • Do your work as per quality and timeline expectations. • Not just to pass on requirements but fully understand the purpose (what does the customer want to achieve) and based on that propose and discuss improvements. • Be the contact point for internal teams and customers if there are scope issues/ misunderstandings. Take the lead to explain  clarify and get everyone aligned on what the scope/requirements are. • Hold demo sessions  explain to stakeholders how we work  and support handover meetings once the software is implemented.  Education: • University Degree in Information Technology or Business Administration.  Knowledge  skills  and experiences: • At least 1-year relevant work experience as an IT Business Analyst. • Strong knowledge of business analysis methodologies and tools. • Experience in agile software development and Jira. • Experience in working with customers from Europe and the US. • Ability to create systematic and consistent requirements specifications in both technical and user-friendly language. • Able to transfer clearly requirements to developers and testers. • Strong logical thinker  so can challenge solutions from a business/customer point of view and ensure we deliver simple instead of over-complicated solutions. • Experience in using BA visualization tools (e.g. BPMN  Visio).  Soft-skills: • Very strong English and overall communication skills • Can build trust with customers and team. • Reliable  responsive  focus on quality. • Ambition to grow and develop. Do not afraid to fail once in a while. • Able to withstand pressure (can be due date/ delivery of document and estimation). Contact the job poster Vu Hien 2nd Talent Acquisition Executive at Swiss Post Solutions Looking for Global IT Services Manager  IT BA Leader  Cloud Engineer  Client Relationship Manager Job Poster Location Ho Chi Minh City  Vietnam Send InMail

About the job Job Purpose The job holder responsible for application development: Directly consulting and analyzing development requirements from business units  ensuring complete and effective conversion of business unit requirements into application requirements. The job holder responsible for user support: Directly support users in daily activities  ensuring users' problems are handled as quickly as possible  meeting their business needs. Key Accountabilities (1) Responsibility in developing applications Receive requests to develop and improve products  processes  and features from business units. Analyze and advise business units the most effective plan to fulfill requirements. Talk to the development department to design a solution for these requirements. Develop detailed requirements specification in a language suitable for programmers (developer)  Ensure development requirements are clear and technologically feasible. Participate in coordination with the professional unit to check the development results  to ensure that the application meets the requirements agreed with the business unit. Prepare and issue user manuals for technology products. Participate in direct training on products and technology features for IT support department and professional staff if necessary. Key Accountabilities (2) Responsibilities In User Support L2  L3 level support with assigned requirements. Key Accountabilities (3) Other Responsibilities Participate in technology projects as assigned. Participating in the development of business processes and guidelines of the Unit. Participate in technology risk handling as assigned. Perform other tasks as required by management. Success Profile - Qualification and Experiences Qualifications Graduated from University or above. Business analysis certificate preferred. Work Experience Minimum 5 years in related field Foreign language English/ according to TCB's regulations in each period

About the job Slash is looking for a Senior Business Analyst to build an exciting fintech/eCommerce product with us. As a Senior Business Analyst  you will drive core features of our products and enable the success of our customers  partners  and further driving Slash’s strategic transformation into a software product organization. You’ll collaborate with other engineers  and our Sales and marketing teams to own the delivery of your product. You’ll prioritize that feedback  plan updates  and ready the overall system for launch. You are responsible for the product planning and execution throughout the product life cycle to ensure the product supports the company’s overall strategy and goals.  Responsibilities: • Drawing product wireframe  functional workflow. • Close cooperation with our technical specialists in the design  implementation  and deployment of solutions. • Gather relevant data and conduct business analysis  develop and manage product trackers  timelines  and lead cross-functional groups to deliver on project objectives. • Launch new products and features  test their performance  measure features and iterate quickly. • Communicate with cross-functional teams (Business  IT) and work with go-to-market stakeholders to launch features. • Identify user needs and market dynamics  and use these to inform the strategic direction. • Work with external third parties to assess partnerships and licensing opportunities • Be an expert with respect to the competition • Develop the core positioning and messaging for the product • Perform product demos to customers • Work with business to figure out pricing to meet revenue and profitability goals • Act as a leader and ownership within the company  Requirements: • 3+ years of relevant Business Analysis  Software Product Management experience  ideally Fintech and eCommerce field • Direct experience working with engineers to balance scope  time to market  and functionality  constantly making trade-offs using qualitative and quantitative absent data. • Demonstrated success defining and launching excellent products • Excellent written and verbal communication skills • Bachelor's degree in computer science  engineering or related field. • Excellent teamwork skills • Experience in conducting several experiments during product development • Proven ability to influence cross-functional teams without formal authority • Examples and at least one sample of an effective document delivered in the past Contact the job poster Hong Anh Nguyen 2nd People Operations Manager Job Poster Location Vietnam Send InMail

location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
description: About the job The Brilliant Career You'll Love  Business Analysts are engineers who are responsible for understanding the client’s business need  capturing the domain expertise that the client has  and translating this accurately into a succinct requirements document that will serve as the input to the software designers.  Key responsibilities:  Report directly to supervisor(s) and Project Manager if required  Work with project team members and others if any  Communicate with client counterparts if any  Assess the client’s business needs and business processes (current and future)  Interview the domain experts at the client company to capture all relevant domain knowledge  Conduct market research  Document the product’s vision and the project’s scope  Document the client’s business requirements in detail  (requirement specifications) with all assumptions and caveats included  Define quality attributes  external interfaces  constraints  and other non-functional requirements  Lead requirements analysis and verification  ensuring that requirement statements are complete  consistent  concise  comprehensible  traceable  feasible  unambiguous  and verifiable and that they conform to standards  Participate in peer reviews and inspections of requirements documents  Participate in peer reviews of work products derived from requirements  specifications to ensure that the requirements were interpreted correctly  Serve as an internal point of contact for development team whenever requirements need to be clarified.  Qualifications  Your Skills/Experience :  Possess basic & Discrete knowledge and perform basic requirement gathering/management work mostly independently and require supervision for more complex work  Knowledge of software development process  especially software requirement analysis  Good command of English communications skills (speaking  listening  reading and writing)  Good listening and interviewing skills to understand a customer’s business environment and processes  Ability to document business requirements in an accurate  unambiguous and succinct fashion  Good UI/UX knowledge/experience  Good presentation and client relation skills  Good organizational  analytical  as well as oral and written communication skills  Aptitude to learn and understand new and emerging technologies  Experience in Agile environment or Scrum Master is a plus.  Additional Information  Perks You'll Enjoy  Open for remotely working Working in one of the Best Places to Work in Vietnam Building large-scale & global software products Working & growing with Passionate & Talented Team Diverse careers opportunities with Software Outsourcing  Software Product Development  IT Solutions & Consulting Attractive Salary and Benefits Two performance appraisals every year Onsite opportunities: short-term and long-term assignments in North American (U.S  Canada)  Europe  Asia. Flexible working time Various training on hot-trend technologies  best practices and soft skills Premium healthcare insurance for you and your loved ones Company trip  big annual year-end party every year  team building  etc. Fitness & sport activities: football  tennis  table-tennis  badminton  yoga  swimming… Joining community development activities: 1% Pledge  charity every quarter  blood donation  public seminars  career orientation talks … Free in-house entertainment facilities (foosball  ping pong  gym…)  coffee  and snack (instant noodles  cookies  candies…) And much more  join us and let yourself explore other fantastic things

About the job KEY DUTIES  1) This position oversees NSR planning and DFR / Pricing control (40%) - Collaborate with Commercial (RGM) & Sales (CS) to evaluate revenue forecast assumptions on a monthly basis. Extend this to business planning cycle when required. - Review actual performance vs the forecast with comparisons to PY & BP  and highlight the drivers and opportunity areas on a monthly basis. - Chart out the execution plan in collaboration with Commercial & Sales team to realize identified opportunities so as to target % DFR reduction year on year. - In charge of reviewing and controlling promotion plan for GT channel (Distributors / Wholesalers) - Prepare post-evaluation for big promotions in GT and recommend actions for improvements - Ensure right targets are established in MM & Daily reports timely to facilitate performance evaluation.  2) This position is in charge of Value Chain development (20%) - Develop Value Chain for new innovations - Take ownership on Value Chain discussions and alignments in System Finance meeting  3) This position ensures monthly management reports are completed timely and accurately (10%) - Monthly BIG performance review (finance slides) - Monthly RCM business review (pricing / P&L slides) - Ad-hoc requirements from CFO / line manager.  4) This position participates in new projects/initiatives (30%) - Ensure timely evaluation of CTS with comparisons across channels & regions - Evaluate distributors' DOI holdings vs established standards & outline corrective measures. - Co-ordinate with Commercial team to ensure Distributor performance and profitability for top #25 Distributors across HCM & HN and top #25 Distributors across other regions is analyzed.  JOB REQUIREMENTS - University/Bachelor’s degree  Professional qualification in Finance/ Accounting is preferred - Experienced in Finance/ Accounting. Direct exposure in Commercial Finance/ FMCG industry would be highly recommended - Strong analytical skills - Experience in Finance Partnering  especially working with Sales is preferred. - Having good business acumen - Understanding about system (SAP  Margin Minder  etc.) is a plus

Strong sense of ownership and entrepreneurship spirit  a can-do attitude Strong working knowledge of project methodology and delivering high quality project artefacts and Agile  iterative development process  such as Scrum Knowledge of tools like Lucid Chart  Jira  Figma etc Experience in writing use cases  workflows  business processes  business requirements document  functional specifications document and user requirements to functional design Understanding of digital experience  platforms  and underlying technologies Excellent communication skills Contact the job poster Le Huong Tra 2nd Talent Acquisition Manager in Galaxy FinX Job Poster Location Vietnam Send InMail

About the job Job Purpose The job holder is responsible for conducting research and analysis in order to create a detailed business analysis  outline problems  opportunities and solutions for a business. The job holder will identify all required data sources  internal and external to support targeted research  analysis and documentation. The job holder is expected to develop new business models to support sound  data-driven business decisions and solutions.  Key Accountabilities Research and Analysis - Gather market trends and internal data to conduct analysis based on business issues and needs as they relate to a potential change or transformation. - Develop informative and actionable reports that highlight business trends and opportunities for improvement. - Identify and report trends and patterns to provide forecast on business plans. - Use data modelling  budgeting and forecasting techniques to present analysis for business decisions. - Recommend solutions (services  processes or products that solve a particular problem)  consider pros and cons of each recommendation. - Identify costs and business savings.  Reporting and Documentation - Work closely with project teams / business tribes to understand and document business objectives and processes. - Suggest modifications and improvements for improved operating efficiencies. - Implement  test and deploy solutions to business problems. - Create functional specifications / documentation / user manuals for new systems and processes. - Explain technical jargon to non-technical / commercial teams. - Simplify requirements so they are easily understood across the whole team.  Requirements - Must have experience in Banking  Financial Services  FinTech  Insurance  Investment  Advisory or relevant industries - At least 3 years of experience in a similar role - Business English standard of proficiency is required - A Bachelor's degree or higher in Finance  Banking  Economics  Computing  Information Technology  Business Management or relevant disciplines - Certification from the Institute of Business Analysis (IIBA) is preferred - Intermediate to Advanced MS Excel skills - Proven analytical and modelling capability with gap analysis  SWOT analysis - Experience working across multiple project scopes and in an agile operating environment - Experience writing SQL queries and using data visualization techniques and tools

description: About the job Established in 2015  Katalon  Inc. is a global product company providing “All-in-one” test automation solutions that empower teams to deliver software with excellence and confidence. Since launch  we have been experiencing exponential growth  continuously furnishing more than 100 000 enterprises worldwide  and were proudly named the “Best Test Automation of 2020” by Gartner Peer Insights.  The Product Management members work on the existing product and market. We keep Katalon ahead of the pack while retaining existing subscribers with high customer satisfaction  including making incremental changes to the current products and keeping the essential operations going. Whereas on the other  our performance drives new revenue with great  new features for Katalon products.  We are looking for a passionate Associate Product Manager & Business Analyst who works closely with both the Product Management team and the Engineering department across the organization to design  implement  and deliver end-to-end revolutionary scenarios in a fast-paced environment.  Key Responsibilities: Gather  analyze and create high-level requirements Participate in the product prototyping process  interface mock-up  wireframe  and GUI creation in an Agile environment Analyze market trends and perform competitor analysis Share the business value to the development team so they understand the intent behind the new feature  release  or product Work with the assigned Product Managers to define the product roadmap and vision Prioritize features by ranking them against the strategic goals and initiatives to make sure the delivery of the product  including managing dependencies in and across releases to complete release phases and milestones Coordinating all of the activities required to bring the product to market. This involves bridging gaps between different functions within the company and aligning all of the teams involved (e.g: Marketing  Sales & Sucess  Customer Support  others) Determine which ideas should be promoted into features to push the product strategy forward Ensure that feedback and requests are seamlessly integrated into the product planning and development processes  Requirements  Key Qualifications 2+ years of experience in Product Owner or Business Analyst roles Possess Agile and Scrum practices Good presentation and stakeholder management Advanced English and aptitude for learning and understanding new and emerging technologies Be familiar with requirement specification techniques: user story  modeling  prototyping. Possess great knowledge about requirement elicitation/management Good organizational  analytical  as well as oral  and written communication skills  Nice to have Experience in Automation Testing is a BIG PLUS. Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or a related technical discipline Software industry domain expertise (preferably SaaS) and understanding of complex technical problems  Benefits  At Katalon  we bring together self-starting  open-minded  and talented people while actively promoting a transparent and growth-enabling working environment.  World-class products  Lifelong comrades  Experts in various fields  Exceptional teams  & Happy workplace are 5 things we are proud to constantly check off the list for the best place to work. But don’t just take our words for it. Take a better look below  Attractive compensation package including achievable Quarterly Performance Bonus (3 - 5 salary months per year) and 13th-Month Salary 19 Annual leave days and other supportive allowances Flexible working time and place together with high-end working equipment A-class office amenities provided  including modern workspace design  in-house entertainment facilities  and unlimited refreshments & snacks Premium healthcare package for you and your loved ones A company trip every summer  annual year-end party  team building activities  and so much more fun are waiting for you   Katalon is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We care about our people and celebrate our differences. We want to work with talented  collaborative  and innovative people. We do not discriminate in hiring or any employment decision based on race  color  religion  national origin  age  sex (including pregnancy  childbirth  or related medical conditions)  marital status  ancestry  physical or mental disability  genetic information  veteran status  gender identity or expression  sexual orientation  or other characteristics protected by law.

location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
description: About the job About Agoda  Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations  flights  and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings  our 4 000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity  creativity  and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership  enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.  Get to Know Our Team  The Data department oversees all of Agoda’s data-related requirements. Our ultimate goal is to enable and increase the use of data in the company through creative approaches and the implementation of powerful resources such as operational and analytical databases  queue systems  BI tools  and data science technology. We hire the brightest minds from around the world to take on this challenge and equip them with the knowledge and tools that contribute to their personal growth and success while supporting our company’s culture of diversity and experimentation. The role the Data team plays at Agoda is critical as business users  product managers  engineers  and many others rely on us to empower their decision making. We are equally dedicated to our customers by improving their search experience with faster results and protecting them from any fraudulent activities. Data is interesting only when you have enough of it  and we have plenty. This is what drives up the challenge as part of the Data department  but also the reward.  The Opportunity  In Agoda  we have 800+ MSSQL instances across 5 data centers which have 7 nines uptime to serve customer  affiliate  and Agoda employee users around the world. About the job About us  Mantu is an international company providing guidance and services to businesses and entrepreneurs. We have many brands in our portfolio and regardless of their expertise or the sector they operate in  they all share a single mission: achieving businesses’ and entrepreneurs’ ambitions.  We constantly generate opportunities for a vast talent community and encourage our team members to have an impact and make a difference. This is how our team has grown to more than 7000 talented people of more than 100 different nationalities  spread across 5 continents and more than 60 countries.  Responsibilities  As a Database Administrator  you are part of the group IT Operations Department  and you will be responsible for the group database systems.  You will work with the team on the migration of our on-premises Data Center to Microsoft Azure by using Infrastructure-as-code and be the key actor to adopt cloud managed services as DBAAS and SQL managed instance with the goal to improve our applications performances.  By your knowledge and experiences  you will design our database architecture  define security policies  and manage our group database infrastructure and services as well as establish a performance baseline to evaluate the Database system efficiency. You will also work with the other IT teams to give the best practice and coach our IT teams on all database relative topics.  By joining our team  you will: Migrate the group infrastructure to Microsoft Azure by defining technologies and managed services Deploy & configure new database servers  instances with Ansible & Terraform Administrate database system  maintain a stability of 24/7  fine-tune database and SQL performance  specialized on MS SQL Server and MySQL Implement monitoring system  alerting  and reporting running on Grafana  Prometheus  Zabbix and ELK Enhance and improve BI packages/services and coach BI Developers on query optimization Resolve incidents  implement  and participate on the problem resolutions Participate to prepare a group level of DRP solution for the group’s ERP system  Our ideal candidate Bachelor’s degree from engineering schools in computer science or related technical disciplines (or equivalent) 2+ years of experience in related positions  with strong skills on Microsoft SQL servers  Microsoft Azure and solid knowledge of SQL Server eco-services (i.e. SSIS  SSAS  SSRS  Business Intelligent  SSDT… ) Knowledge and experience of other database models as MySQL  PostgreSQL and NoSQL is a plus Solid knowledge of MS Windows Server eco-services: Windows server  WSUS  Active Directory… Previous experience with Monitoring stack & TimeSeries DB  specialized in ELK  Prometheus  Zabbix  Grafana is a strong plus Infrastructure as Code experience with Ansible and Terraform is strongly preferable for this position Good communication skills in English (oral and written communication) Analytical and Problems solving  Proactive and logical  Adaptability (work in a continuously changing environment) Our offer Be part of an international  multicultural environment of 7 000 talented people over 60 countries and 5 continents Fast growing global company  opportunities to grow quickly with a tailored made career path Soft skill trainings: interpersonal communication  team management  project management Team lunch  after-work and other successes celebrations Ability to support non-profit organizations You will have the opportunity to unlock your potential  both professional and personally Our contact Location: Block A2  15th Floor  Viettel Building  285 Cach Mang Thang Tam  District 10  HCMC  Mantu is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We are committed to promoting diversity within the workforce and creating an inclusive working environment. For this purpose  we welcome applications from all qualified candidates regardless of gender  sexual orientation  race  ethnicity  beliefs  age  marital status  disability  or other characteristics.

About the job Knowledge/Skills/Competencies Required: Qualifications: 1. Minimum of 5 years in data-driven software development or system administration with at least 3 consecutive years working as data/report developer  database administrator  or the likes  2. Having knowledge of data processing technology  data operation and management  data/information security or an equivalent combination of education and work experience  3. Having knowledge of logical and physical database design concepts  4. Having good knowledge of database technology platforms and related especially Ms SQL  Ms SSIS  MySQL. If having DB2 skills will be an advantage. 5. Demonstrated ability to understand  analyze  and apply abstract database concepts as well as translating informational needs from the business to data solutions  6. Demonstrated oral and written communication skills  7. Ability to effectively interact with peer level associates  8. Ability to work independently with minimal supervision  and usually meets all expectations.  Principal Responsibilities: Responsibility as a database administrator (DBA) will be the performance  integrity and security of a database. Will be involved in the planning and development of the database  as well as in troubleshooting any database issues.  Functional Responsibilities: 1. Responsible for building  enhancing  and maintaining databases in support of applications across the whole IT system. 2. Ensures compliance with the organization's data and database standards. 3. Implement tools/solutions and monitor database access permissions and privileges and security. 4. Implement tools/solutions and monitor performance and manage parameters in order to provide fastest database responses possible. 5. Work with other teams to map out the conceptual design for a planned database  to refine the logical design so that it can be translated into a specific data model. 6. Further refining the physical design to meet system storage requirements 7. Install and test new versions of the database management system (DBMS) 8. Establish and maintain database documentation  including data standards  procedures and definitions for the data dictionary (metadata). 9. Work with other teams to develop  manage and test back-up. And manage the security and disaster recovery aspects of a database. 10. Carry out capacity planning. Supervisory Responsibilities: 1. May provide work guidance to lower level and project staff. 2. Manage the vendor resources to deliver quality in projects.  COMPENSATION & BENEFITS - Salary: Negotiation - Benefit: Attractive - Working Location: Hanoi Vietnam. Candidate sends CV to email: info@tuyendungtot.com.vn   Hotline: 0902336805 Contact the job poster Dao Duc Tho 2nd CEO OF TUYEN DUNG TOT JSC Job Poster Location Hanoi Capital Region Send InMail

About the job 1. MAJOR RESPONSIBILITIES - Installation and Upgrades of Oracle RDBMS software. - Administrate and Maintain existing Oracle RDBMS installations. - Build new databases and perform data migrations. - Perform backup and recovery included management on backup media. - Tuning and performance tuning  troubleshooting of database issues  interaction with Oracle application development for effective database activities. - Develop database usage  security and operation policy and apply to the operation. - Research  design and implement redundant system  policies and procedures for disaster recovery and data archiving to ensure effective protection and integrity of data assets. - Provides on call basis 24/7 availability. - Ready to react for critical errors and service interruptions. - Other duty assigned by Manager.  2. BENEFITS - Salary: Negotiation - 13th moth salary  year-end bonus based on performance review. - Social Insurance  Healthcare Insurance  12 days Annual Leave  …. - Company trip  company outing  teambuilding  … - Travel based on territory alignment and region. - Participating in professional training courses and take international certification exams for free. - Having the development & promotion policy according to Career Path for each position  each department.  4.
