About the job This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more Mô tả công việc We are looking for a Database Administrator who will be responsible for managing and maintaining company databases. In this position  you need to monitor and update malware protection software to make sure that data is kept secure from potential breaches or unauthorized access or accidental loss or corruption. Besides  you also need to organize databases so that data is available for users to find important documents in an efficient manner. You will be the first respondent to database problems that arise and carry out periodic maintenance and troubleshooting. Duties and Responsibilities: ▪ Extracting and loading data▪ Monitoring system performance and identifying problems that arise.▪ Responding to user-reported errors in a timely manner.▪ Controlling access permissions and privileges to protect the security of the database▪ Ensuring that the database is adequately backed up and able to be recovered in the event of data loss.▪ Suggesting changes and improvements for database maintenance or protection.▪ Responsibility for maintaining the integrity and performance of company databases▪ Must guarantee that data is stored securely and optimally▪ Informing end users of changes in databases and train them to utilize systems▪ Write database documentation  including data standards  procedures and definitions for the data dictionary (metadata)▪ Communicate regularly with technical  applications and operational staff to ensure database integrity and security. Yêu cầu ứng viên ▪ Bachelor’s Degree in Information Technology  Computer Science or related fields▪ 2+ years experience as a database administrator.▪ Good English reading and writing to involve in technical discussion with our team.▪ Knowledge in software development methodology (V-Model  Waterfall  Agile/Scrum).▪ Having knowledge in the Internet system  Firewall technology  Cloud computing.▪ Advanced certification as an MCDBA or MCSD for .NET is advantageous.▪ Proficiency in data manipulation languages  including MS SQL  Oracle Database  Hadoop  or PostgreSQL.▪ Analytical mindset and good problem-solving skills.▪ Excellent verbal and written communication skills.▪ Highly organized and responsible.▪ Capable of working under pressure.▪ Up-to-date with trends and developments in database administration. Quyền lợi Attractive salary  based on skill and experience- Working in International company- 13th salary + Yearly performance bonus Bao Viet Health Insurance- Salary review: 2 times per year Welfare regime: Travel  picnic  enjoy holidays  enjoy productivity  lunch  teatime  party & event... Regimes and allowances are based on the Vietnamese Labor Law Working time: 9h-18h Monday to Friday Hạn nộp hồ sơ: 30/04/2022

location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
description: About the job This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more Bolloré Group Driven by a strong entrepreneurial spirit and the desire to create a link between people and their environment  Bolloré group associates humanism with a results-based culture. Thanks to its family shareholding stability  the Group has been conducting a long-term investment and visionary strategy for the past 200 years. Operating in 143 countries with 80 000 employees generating more than 23 billion dollars revenue  Bolloré group is now holding strong positions in each of its business lines: transportation and logistics  communications and media  electricity storage and solutions. B' Information Services is Bolloré Group company based in Paris  deliver and implement IT solutions for Transportation  Logistics and Energy business line with 400 employees globally (Paris  Singapore  Ho Chi Minh  Montreal  Johannesburg  Abidjan...). B' Information Services in Vietnam Looking to grow our development teams in Vietnam  B' Information Services engage in a collaboration with ekino Vietnam  part of Havas Group / Bolloré Group. Ho Chi Minh team is specialized on Microsoft .Net technologies (ASP.Net MVC  Winforms  API  Azure  Xamarin  Knockout JS...)  ESB platform (Webmethods  Java...) and deliver projects using Agile methodology. Working with B' Information Services you’ll have the opportunities to develop your skills and career in an exciting work-place in touch with an international and innovative environment. description: About the job Job Description  The Role  Reporting to the Services Manager based in South Africa.   the Oracle Database Administrator is responsible for the daily management of a wide range of database environments. Experience in Linux will be important for this role running on both cloud and on-premise environments and a background in Solaris and Sparc infrastructure is desirable. This is an operational and project-based role  encompassing design  delivery and run of production systems.  How You Will Contribute  You will work within the Global Unix/Linux Team to provide quality services to external managed service clients as well as internal business units. You may be required to participate in an on-call roster system to support our global offices and clients.  In this role you will be responsible for all levels of database management  maintenance  and overall design and consulting. Your success has come from having a broad exposure to database management design theory and performance optimization techniques. You are frequently called out for being a team player who is driven  your willingness to demonstrate initiative  and always being responsible and flexible to support client needs sometimes outside core business hours.  This job will offer you opportunities to work in diverse environments and be responsible for the provision of system support across multiple domains  design/quote/delivery projects as well as consulting and pre-sales opportunities.  You will be involved in a range of activities including: Installing  configuring and upgrading of Oracle server software and related products Evaluating Oracle features and Oracle related products Establishing and maintaining sound backup and recovery policies and procedures Implementing and maintaining database security Reviewing changes to data models and migration scripts Managing both non-production and production database environments Creating  refreshing pre-production databases via methods including restore  clone and datapump Performing general technical trouble shooting and providing consultation to development teams Working with development teams in writing complex SQL if needed Creating and maintaining PL/SQL modules Sizing  designing and installing Oracle databases including Oracle RAC and Dataguard Interfacing with Oracle Corporation for technical support. Patch Management and Version Control Providing 24/7 support when required Our Ideal Person  With a Least 5 Years Oracle And The Last 3 Years Working Across Oracle 11g Or 12c RAC And Dataguard  You Love What You Do And Things Like  Our ideal person is an experienced Oracle DBA. the ability to perform both Oracle and operating system performance tuning and monitoring  knowledge of all Oracle backup and recovery scenarios and knowledge of Oracle patching and security management have seen you become a trusted advisor within your team  development teams  vendors and system administrators. In addition to this you have a strong knowledge and skills in: SQL and PL/SQL development Experience with Oracle DataPump Experience working on Linux   Unix and MS Windows Systems If you have all of the above as well as: DBA Certifications and/or experience in Oracle Knowledge of AWS Cloud Technologies including Virtual Servers (EC2)  Storage (S3)  database (RDS) and Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) highly regarded Experience monitoring databases with Oracle Enterprise Manager or Solar Winds Experience with Oracle Diagnostics and Tuning modules Then we really want to talk to you  so don’t delay – apply now   Benefits Competitive Salary Great  inclusive team environment

jobTitle: Database Administrator (DBA), based in Da Nang
location: Đà Nang, Da Nang City, Vietnam
description: About the job As a senior DBA you will have total proficiency in all aspects of database administration and design. A key aspect of this position will be to mentor and oversee junior members of staff and will work closely with the development teams to provide high-quality business solutions as well as play an active role in projects from inception to delivery.  Additional responsibilities and accountabilities for this role include:  Support the database management system and all related software. Design and Build Database Environments. Assist in developing estimates and schedules for new projects and/or extensions to existing systems. Technical Support for DBMS Environments. Provide technical support and perform database administration for all development and production databases in multiple environments. Willingness to be on call and support critical database issues that arise in the evening or on weekends.  Qualifications  1+ years of experience with developing relational databases management systems (RDBMS) using MySQL and MS SQL server. Experience supporting Data Warehouse and ETL process. Experience with cloud platform (Azure/AWS) Experience with Devops tools (Terraform  Ansible  Chef  GitLab  Docker  etc) and Linux Shell programming Experience using one or more programming languages: Python  Perl  etc  Additional Information  Working in one of the Best Places to Work in Vietnam Building large-scale & global software products Working & growing with Passionate & Talented Team Diverse careers opportunities with Software Outsourcing  Software Product Development  IT Solutions & Consulting Attractive Salary and Benefits Two performance appraisals every year and performance bonus Onsite opportunities: short-term and long-term assignments in North American (U.S  Canada)  Europe  Asia. Flexible working time Various training on hot-trend technologies  best practices and soft skills Premium healthcare insurance for you and your loved ones Company trip  big annual year-end party every year  team building  etc. Fitness & sport activities: football  tennis  table-tennis  badminton  yoga  swimming… Joining community development activities: 1% Pledge  charity every quarter  blood donation  public seminars  career orientation talks … Free in-house entertainment facilities (foosball  ping pong  gym…)  coffee  and snack (instant noodles  cookies  candies…) And much more  join us and let yourself explore other fantastic things

location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
description: About the job About The Team  The Product Development team in Vietnam focus on solving immediate needs of Shopee for Vietnam market in 3 main categories: Operation / Engagement / Partnership. Our scope consists of products in various sizes and complexity levels  serving both internal users (Shopee staffs) as well as external users (our buyers  sellers  brands and partners). As a Software Engineer in the team  you'll be part of a Scrum team targeting at a specific category to develop impactful tools / features to accelerate business goals in that area.  Job Description Responsible for MySQL/NoSQL/MSSQL database administration and management (capacity planning  installation  backup  recovery  monitoring  optimizations  troubleshooting  etc.) Support the development team for database design Review existing software architecture and contribute to improving on the future architecture for stability and a maximum of performance Define and develop projects that reduce operational costs and automate regular tasks Research and develop new technologies and approaches for building high-performance data persistence systems  Requirements Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science or related field Solid understanding of MySQL/NoSQL/MSSQL database technologies and experience with SQL query/SQL programming Good experience and deep understanding of MySQL and MSSQL is a plus. Familiar with scripting programming (at least one of Shell/Python/Perl/Ruby etc) and automation Familiar with Linux systems and good system troubleshooting skills Experience in system administration or development is preferred Can communicate with English speaking colleagues.
